mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.USER_ID, Q.QNA_DATE, A.ANSWER_STATUS FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC;

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.PHONE_NO, Q.QNA_DATE, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, F.ORIGIN_NAME, F.CHANGE_NAME, F.PATH FROM MEMBER U INNER JOIN QNA Q ON U.USER_ID = Q.USER_ID INNER JOIN FILE_ADD F ON Q.QNA_NO = F.QNA_NO WHERE Q.QNA_NO = #{QNA_NO};
